t:
And so did we.
Last night I heard my daughter scream about a supposed
monster in the closet. As I
walked in sleepily, I saw the
closet door move slightly.

We ran out of the house as we realized, to begin with, we never had a closet in this house.
c:
What's in your closet?


#Collab and share what happens when #sleepwalksout of the door.  #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba



#closet #monster #daughter #sleep #fear
